The focus is on both the person's feet and the soccer ball during the kick. One foot is planted on the ground while the other, the kicking foot, is suspended in the air after the follow-through.**
Human-Written Description for Scenery: **The scene is set on a green soccer pitch at night, illuminated by bright overhead lights against a dark background. A yellow and black Nike soccer ball, covered in water droplets, rests on the turf. A foot wearing a bright red cleat with a silver swoosh makes contact with the ball in slow motion, causing water to spray from its surface upon impact.**

Please note that the video features **main subjects switching from one to another**.

Shot Size Information: The video begins with a medium shot of the first subject. Then it becomes a close-up shot of the second subject.
